Amount: (i) 113.5 to 11350; to provide 5 milligrams per kilogram of body weight per day
Indicationsforuse: Calves: As an aid in the prevention of coccidiosis caused by Eimeria bovis and E. zuernii
Limitations: Top-dress on or mix in the daily ration. Feed for 21 days when experience indicates that coccidiosis is likely to be a hazard as the sole source of amprolium. Withdraw 24 hours before slaughter. A withdrawal period has not been established for this product in preruminating calves. Do not use in calves to be processed for veal

Amount: (ii) 113.5 to 11350; to provide 10 milligrams per kilogram of body weight per day
Indicationsforuse: Calves: As an aid in the treatment of coccidiosis caused by Eimeria bovis and E. zuernii
Limitations: Top-dress on or mix in the daily ration. Feed for 5 days as the sole source of amprolium. Withdraw 24 hours before slaughter. A withdrawal period has not been established for this product in preruminating calves. Do not use in calves to be processed for veal
